website_summaries.verdict: Design and quality outranks the competitors – by far the best available today.
pros: Ruggedly made micro-serrated blades cut effortlessly
Boasts spacious, cushioned handles for added control and comfort
cons: They may operate stiffly at first, but the shears loosen up with use

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive but worse quality than the one of same brand/model I bought from Macy’s.
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends is using a same brand+model bought from Macy’s and she recommended it to me. I bought it on Amazon because it is the same brand same model but much cheaper. However, it is not as sharp (and smooth when use) as the one from Macy’s. So I bought another one from Macy’s which is more expensive but turns out to be much better (heavier, sharper, and of higher quality) than this one. I returned the one to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Product rusts
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy. These starting rusting after one month of normal use in my home
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Wefing

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a really good pair of Shears for the kitchen. I thought, hey they are made in Germany! I use them everyday, however, I regret my decision to purchase them. After a few washes, and no they DID NOT sit in a sink of water and soak, they have started to rust in and around the screw area of the shears. Extremely disappointed. I would suggest looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Tigalia

customer_reviews.title: The Correct Shears for a Henckels Knife Block
customer_reviews.text: Finally, the real deal Henckels shears to replace your lost ones or add to your vast collection of 4-Star or Pro-S knives. Other models(blue dot) have thinner handles, so they won't look right in your block. Buy these and your Chi will remain intact.
customer_reviews.author: Diver Joe

customer_reviews.title: Rust! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, started rusting after about a month. I don’t abuse them either and leave them open to dry after use. Wish I would have read the review more closely before purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: katie spier

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: These shears are a big help in my kitchen. The day I received them I used them to butterfly a whole chicken and they worked perfectly. I have arthritis in my hands and fingers but was able to get the job done without calling on my husband for assistance. Not the top of their product line but they are very well made and a very good price. I try to avoid items made in China whenever possible and was very happy to find German made products. I will certainly but other items from this company and recommend them to my friends and family. We all love to cook! Also, they were delivered a day sooner than expected so thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Best scissors out there as far as I can tell
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are really great! I finally got a pair of for my wife after she constantly borrowed mine. I've tried buying cheaper brands but nothing is as farming as these scissors. I'm a convert! Really well they're easy to use and well-balanced, they don't loosen up and they stay sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Roberts

customer_reviews.title: you’d be hard-pressed to find a better pair of kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Nov 2017, to replace a pair we bought in about 2001. We lost the first pair and, of course, found them the day before our order arrived. These are made in Germany and indistinguishable from our old pair. Given the price ($15), you’d be hard-pressed to find a better pair of kitchen shears.
customer_reviews.author: Jad H.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of shears!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shears. They fit right in my knife block so they are handy. So far they have cut everything I have given them from chicken bones to blister packs and they have stayed sharp. Also use to cut up leafy vegetables and other soft items with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling45

customer_reviews.title: Great Shears!
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction, tight fit. They seem well made. Run them through the dishwasher twice so far and no issues or rusting. Better made than the standard, lower cost, J A Henckels shears. The Zwilling name makes them an upgraded product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Rusty junk, STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors were purchased in October and are now rusting to the point where they no longer function smoothly. Not to mention the possible danger from using rusty kitchen utensils. These may have the J.A. Henckels name on them but they don't have the same quality as you'd expect from a premium brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for Henckels 4-Star set
customer_reviews.text: So we 'misplaced' our pair that came with the 4-star set we purchased years ago. These are an exact replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I seldom write a review but sometimes the quality and service of a product requires a comment. I have been using J a Henckels knifes and shears for more years than you can imagine. The quality, durability, looks, on this particular kitchen shear is so good I don’t replace them I just buy more for other uses. I have now started giving then to friends who never have the right tool to do the job. Thumbs up to Zwilling J a Henckels for making great products.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: They rust.. not the quality I'm used to for this brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought these around Christmas and in only two months they have started to rust around the screw and on the blade where the scissor blades touch each other. I hand wash them (not dishwasher). This is not normal for this brand and I suspect the might be a knockoff. I wish I had seen the other reviews about the rust before buying.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good scissors
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these scissors. First set dissapeared from my home. They work well, JA Henkels make quality knives and kitchen tools. I am happy with my purchase. Only one shortcoming. I wished the blades separated to allow for more thorough cleaning and ease of sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A Cook's Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: The purchase was a replacement for the shears I had and used almost everyday for more than 20 years. As an accomplished cook, I use kitchen shears for multiple cooking tasks and Zwilling is the best and most reliable with a comfortable grip and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi0319

customer_reviews.title: Dulls way too fast
customer_reviews.text: 1 year later and it’s duller than a butter knife. My original shears in my set of Pro S lasted over 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Great all-purpose scissors
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these scissors at an estate sale and loved them so much I bought more from Amazon. They cut through pretty much anything around the house. I keep them in the kitchen drawer. I also bought several for stocking stuffers at Christmas. Can’t beat the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pennyannie

customer_reviews.title: Sooo sharp and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never cut chicken so quickly and easily. These are incredibly sharp and strong. Very comfortable in my petite hand. I haven’t had them long so I can’t say how durable but I love them so far!
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: A compact ktchen helper.
customer_reviews.text: This is a German made product. The product seems light and compact but it is very sharp. I have tested it on cloth, cardboards and chicken and it really cuts well. There is another Henckels scissors with the description "International" about $5 cheaper but I believe that is made in China. Is the difference in country of made worth $5 and that is up to personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Wong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Scissors
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite kitchen shower gifts. What can I say about a perfect tool? It has everything you could wish for in a pair of kitchen scissors. You'll never be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Case

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace the pair I had for many years. Unfortunately, only after a few months these began to rust. Very poor quality compared to the the original kitchen shears I had.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: These cut thru most things needed in my kitchen. They slip in dishwasher too. These are more sturdy than others and fits nicely in my butcher block for knives/sissors.
customer_reviews.author: Travelnblond

customer_reviews.title: Bought this December 2018
customer_reviews.text: The best scissors for the knife block. Whether you are trimming raw meat, opening packages, or simply cutting out snowflakes, this scissors is amazing. The blade is durable and stays sharp. I would buy this again and again, but I don't think I'll have to, it's well made.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used these yet, but the description says "UNIQUE DESIGN – Made with one straight and one serrated blade to provide the ease of cutting, not matter the material or ingredient", buy both blades are straight.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and very sharp. Use these for all things in the kitchen, cutting fat off meat, cutting veggies to opening packages.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen shears! I have owned another set of these for 25+ years. I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I broke the original ones that came with my knife set and these were the closest match. They’re exactly what they’re supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sharp, not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well built sturdy pair of shears. Cuts with ease. Good thing because they are too small and hurt the back of my fingers if used for a prolonged period.
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater Dave

customer_reviews.title: great and useful shears
customer_reviews.text: These are great scissors and actually our second pair. We have another pair that came with the knife block/set that we've had for ten years. We ended up buying this second pair because those are often in the dishwasher or occasionally the kids swipe them. All around great and useful in the kitchen whether you are cutting packages, paper or food. Very easy to clean and we've had no issues putting them in the dishwasher. One of the most useful items in the knife block.
customer_reviews.author: bionichands

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Henckels???
customer_reviews.text: After the first washing, these so-called henckels kitchen shears showed rust. I have had henckels for decades and have NEVER had anything rust. I think these may be counterfeit, as they certainly are not the quality I have come to expect from henckels.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Basic Kitchen Shears
customer_reviews.text: These are the best kitchen shears I ever owned. Recently my pair grew legs and walked away (at least that's what my children would have me believe) But nonetheless, I am returning for a replacement pair, because I really miss them. They cut everything - they cut herbs, packages, paper, meats, small bones - I have not been diappointed yet.....except when they disappeared. Sadness. Oh well, with Amazon Prime, I will have another pair in a couple of days - joy!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Three

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are really sharp and do a great job in the kitchen. Hope they stay sharp but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Burton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nice scissors. We use them in the kitchen, as all-purpose scissors. Sharp and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: wickedly sharp quality german made product. why buy cheap junk when you can buy these?
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Love Henckels shears
customer_reviews.text: Love Henckels shears. Have used them for a long time and decided to buy another one because one is not enough when everybody likes/uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: We use these kitchen shears for cutting meat and it works great! Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaK

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, nice look, balanced...work very well and match nicely with my Henkel knife set
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous female

customer_reviews.title: J A henckels kitchen scissors
customer_reviews.text: Exact match for the "one that got away". Very happy
customer_reviews.author: CCMacC

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen/cooking scissors
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these!!! My second time purchasing. First pair lasted a decade (with periodic washes in the dish washer.) Use these exclusively for cooking (Eg cutting herbs, dried fruits, and so much more!)
customer_reviews.author: Gourmette808

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen shears. I use them daily for a variety of things.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lynn Battles

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works well, wish blades a little longer but description on site was accurate. Very sharp and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: f keith handley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a replacement for a garbage pair of scissor on a old knife block. These scissors are way better in every way. You can tell they are quality. Very sharp and they can be dismantled for cleaning. You won't go wrong with these scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who knew these were indoor/outdoor!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a pair lost in the bushes .... these guys are great inside and great for small branches when doing shrub maintenance
customer_reviews.author: david weinstock

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: The best shears around. I’ve had another pair for 20 years, and bought another (the old one is in another continent and still works as new: cuts through chicken bones like nothing)
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: These scissors are excellent
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are sturdy, well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy R

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value Priced Henckel Shears.
customer_reviews.text: We needed replacement shears for the pair that came with the fancy Henckel knife set we got for a wedding present 15 years ago, and this fit the bill. Given the price, I was skeptical that these shears are the same quality as the pair we got with our knife block set, but so far after 6 months I'm quite pleased. The blades are sharp, it's stainless steal, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: My $.03

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: Henkels shears are a neceasity in the kitchen. We bought some lesser sheara to learn we need them, but tossed them due to poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: daGrouch

customer_reviews.title: Best scissor
customer_reviews.text: Love these scissors. I have one pair for the garden and one for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C

customer_reviews.title: If you borrow, you better put them back! I love these!
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen scissors ever! ❤️ I use them on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great sharp scissors
customer_reviews.text: The scissors are sharp and cut through plastic, paper and meat easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Williams

customer_reviews.title: Recommend These, They're Good
customer_reviews.text: These are Exactly what we were looking for, they match the Knife Set Perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: looks and acts like the real thing so must be the real thing ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. FIrst one was part of a set. Cannot tell the difference between the two which translates to: looks and acts like the real thing so must be the real thing (-: would get it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: My old scissors fnaly had to be throwed. These are a good replacement.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Just, ok.
customer_reviews.text: One handle has broken and slides off when using. Good for some kitchen use, but you'll need a much heavier duty if you use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne Boatwright

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work okay but even with hand washing it’s already rusting by the screw. :(
customer_reviews.author: Briana Hirth

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, easy to use and clean. Can't ask for more, especially at this price.
customer_reviews.author: BobZoom

customer_reviews.title: Great product, don’t hesitate to buy
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace my wife’s moms she loved it soooo much.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money on this!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely fantastic. I bought the brand because I have knives that are the same brand. When I fell in love with those I finally decided to replace my kitchen shears. Great weight, feel, and cutting power needed for any meat you may need to cut. They are the best thing I have bought in a long time that was worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: James Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I simply like it. It's a very handy tool in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: PEAK MASTER®

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These replaced a pair of Oxo Good Grips and are MUCH better
customer_reviews.author: June Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome these scissors cut everything
customer_reviews.text: Awesome these scissors cut everything! I even use on crab legs! They were a great gift for my mom to use in the kitchen. We've had them several months and they still work great. I was however disappointed with packaging, especially since they were a gift. The didn't even come in a package or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ahart

customer_reviews.title: Utility scissors
customer_reviews.text: Handy dandy utility scissors cut so very much stuff it's crazy. I have two pair.
customer_reviews.author: Black Jane 1

customer_reviews.title: Nice sharp kitchen shears!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a nice set of inexpensive kitchen shears that actually cut, this is the pair. These are not extreme heavy duty shears for cutting through turkey bones, but they are perfect for everyday kitchen use (opening packages, trimming parsley, cutting stuff). We are so glad to have these after two pairs of "cheap" ones that wouldn't cut open a bag of chips. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Expected a more quality product from this company.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in these kitchen shears. I really expected more from this company. These rusted after only 2 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of scissors after over 13 years with the 1st pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mag Fan

customer_reviews.title: Henckel quality
customer_reviews.text: Use these to complete out a set I got on black Friday, cuts through meat to trim fat on chicken real well and nicely rounds out my set of knives. Henckels, good quality and lives up to the name. Not much else to add.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Time

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, cuts through anything in and out of the kitchen. Love my new scissors!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Good shears but need gluing occasionally.
customer_reviews.text: Good shears for the price but the plastic handle slips away from the base and needs to be glued. I have 3 of these and they do make life easier and stay sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen shears.
customer_reviews.text: Our old kitchen shears in this brand broke, this was a prefect substitution.
customer_reviews.author: April H

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and on point~
customer_reviews.text: Strong and effective and matches our knives. This brand is our preference for a reason~
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L Igo

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to use, very sharp, fits perfectly in my Henkel knife block. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than described
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are only 8 inches long, not the 10 inches in the description. The handle openings are pretty small, and I don't think the person I bought them for will be able to use them easily. I am returning them and will look for another pair that is larger.
customer_reviews.author: Twink

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: My favorite kitchen shears .... a must in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: NorthEasternBelle

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: I've come to the conclusion that kitchen shears don't last very long, so as a result I look for one that is reasonably priced and well-made, not expecting too much. These shears fill the bill on both counts. They are quality and don't cost that much so when they break--which they will eventually--I won't cry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Man Jack

customer_reviews.title: Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of buying cheap dull kitchen shears. Came in time for Thanksgiving so I was able to use them on the turkey to cut off some of the access skin and stuff off. Way better then anything I bought in the past
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nicely build
customer_reviews.text: Both this to complement my knife set, I lost this and was looking to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Shahram

customer_reviews.title: Good Kitchen Scissors
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I did not give these a five star rating, was that they are a bit smaller than I expected. I expected them to be the same size as the one's that came with the set of knives. However, they do work well for the great price. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Beth W.

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: They rust quickly, I had to return after just one week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Quang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, dependable, value
customer_reviews.text: Stays sharp, doesn’t rust in dishwasher. Strong through a bag or meat. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: carica abeyer

customer_reviews.title: The original and best
customer_reviews.text: The original scissors to my set had legs. What is it with walking scissors? These are the ones to purchase if yours walked away too.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gaggini

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitchen Shears ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Kitchen Shears ever! This is my second pair. My first pair disappeared. Was given a different brand, couldn't hold a candle to these.
customer_reviews.author: MeBro

customer_reviews.title: I like the shears very much
customer_reviews.text: I like the shears very much, but they are smaller than I thought they would be. I had similar shears that were a tad larger and I left them at a picnic where I had taken them to open packages of hot dogs. I missed them so much that I ordered another pair. Maybe the design has changed. I had my older shears for many, many years and if these last and stay as sharp as the original ones, then I will be very, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware - these are a knock off
customer_reviews.text: Product started to rust after first use. These are a knock off of the real thing. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: I like the new kitchen shears!
customer_reviews.text: I do like the Henckels kitchen shears--they did everything my other shears did. They don't fit as well into my butcher-block holder as well as the bigger, heaver shears that I lost, and they are a bit smaller. I'm getting used to them now, and they do their job!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Purse

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It was an exact replacement for the one that broke. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: MARC V.

customer_reviews.title: Best All Around Utility Shears
customer_reviews.text: I do EVERYTHING with these. I had my last pair for almost twenty years, until my husband broke them trying to do one of the few jobs they couldn't handle:)
customer_reviews.author: Bridgetown Mama

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitchen Shears I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Somehow managed to lose the shears that came with my knife set. The are an exact replacement and for a lot less than I would pay elsewhere. I use them daily. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: Used it once, washed it once and it rusted. I have less expensive Henckles scissors that never rusted.
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shears
customer_reviews.text: excellent item. cuts anything and most everything. Perfect kitchen shears. These you can take apart to clean, compared to the previous pair that you couldnt take aprt to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it , sharp, easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Ann Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with these shears. They fit comfortably in my hand and cut well. So far, I've used them on, among other things, chicken, string, blister pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kittery

customer_reviews.title: Shears
customer_reviews.text: I has some kitchen shears that were given to me years ago but had to be replaced. Since I have knives by this brand I choose these shears and have been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rose F. Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have never been disappointed by Henckels products in my life and this product lived up to its name. This product was superb as was expected
customer_reviews.author: Daemion

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I could tell this is a very good pair of shears the minute I handled it for the first time. Very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rusts
customer_reviews.text: The scissors rust the first use in dishwasher. Why didn't they use a stainless steel screw?
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Good, sharp scissors, nice action, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors, sharp, excellent action. Nice to have in the kitchen and for all around use around the house. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sam W

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality shears. Very sharp and cut well. I highly recommend this kitchen shears, they will make your kitchen work much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Mom22boys

customer_reviews.title: Made in Germany, even in 2019!
customer_reviews.text: For this reasonable price, this is a German-manufactured product, not some made in China crap.
customer_reviews.author: CKinSF

customer_reviews.title: It was what I wanted and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: The kitchen shears were an exact form of a kitchen shear that I have had for several years and work as good or not better then the first set that I have been using for over ten years.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Wilcox

product_meta.title: Zwilling J.a. Henckels J.a. Henckels J.a. Henckels Twin L Kitchen Shears, 1 Lb
product_meta.description:
ZWILLING J.A. Henckels TWIN L Kitchen Shears handle every kitchen cutting task with ease. Whether snipping herbs, cutting foods or safely opening packages, these shears are up to the task. The stainless steel blade can be sharpened and the shears are dishwasher safe (hand wash recommended).

One of the world’s oldest brands, ZWILLING J.A. HENCKELS has been synonymous with high-quality products since 1731. ZWILLING J.A. HENCKELS is the gold standard for premium cutlery, cookware, and kitchen tools around the world. The global company has traditionally used innovative technology to manufacture products of the highest quality and most appealing design. To achieve this, ZWILLING J.A. HENCKELS works together with renowned designers who share the brand’s values and visions. Then and now, ZWILLING J.A. HENCKELS is committed to the principle: our customers´ satisfaction is our success
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY – With cutting age technology Zwillings has created a brand designed to provide premium cutlery, cookware, and kitchen tools around the world since 1731.
UNIVERSAL USAGE - Handle every kitchen cutting task with ease. Whether snipping herbs, cutting foods or safely opening packages, these shears are up to the task.
UNIQUE DESIGN – Made with one straight and one serrated blade to provide the ease of cutting, not matter the material or ingredient
ERGONOMICAL – The design of the polypropylene handles allow any person to cut comfortably, no awkward wrist movements. The design is contoured for the universal usage of every person.
BUILT IN ROTARY – Comes with a built-in rotary that loosens stiff lids
